reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major immune complex diseases: Systemic lupus erythematosus (~2-3 per 100k), Rheumatoid arthritis (~3-4 per 100k), Serum sickness (~0.5-1 per 100k), Post-streptococcal glomerulonephritis (~1-2 per 100k). Total ~8.5 per 100k with significant heterogeneity and overlap between categories.
